code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const user=useSelector(state=>state.user.user);const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();if(!user){navigate('/login',{state:{from:location}});return null;}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
